channel.title: 317 webclient errors
channel.description:
Hey,
http://forum.ragezone.com/f368/tut-317-377-old-client-making-webclient-448998/
I just followed that tut, and setup my 317 client nicely!
However, i've fixed the cache issue(Cannot connect, trying again in 30 seconds..)
But I still have the issue of it not connecting to my server. The downloadable client does, but this one just doesn't for some reason!
Anyone know why?

item.title: 317 webclient errors
item.dc:creator: @GaMuPk GaMuPk
item.description:
@GaMuPk wrote:

Hey,

http://forum.ragezone.com/f368/tut-317-377-old-client-making-webclient-448998/

I just followed that tut, and setup my 317 client nicely!

However, i’ve fixed the cache issue(Cannot connect, trying again in 30 seconds…)

But I still have the issue of it not connecting to my server. The downloadable client does, but this one just doesn’t for some reason!

Anyone know why?
